name: Four to Freedom
description:
You wake up in a mysterious cabin in the woods. Can you escape?

Four to Freedom is a short escape room game built for the 4th Annual Hawktober Game Jam hosted by HawkZombie. The game was put together in seven days using marketplace assets (such as the Horror Engine) and customized blueprints.

The intention was to improve our skills (specifically blueprints) by putting a game together in as short amount a time as possible.

Please let us know what you think in the coments!
